title: [Lysierian Hills, Lake Marliese]
description: From this angle, the surface of the lake appears to be covered with diamonds.  Moonlight shimmers off the water all around you, providing a flickering counterpoint to the starry night sky.
From this angle, the surface of the lake appears to be covered with diamonds.  Light shimmers off the water all around you, almost blinding you to anything beyond this spot.
From this angle, the surface of the lake appears silver.  Moonlight casts slivers of silver along the crystal lake.
